## Description of repo

This contains analysis scripts, data, and output for:  
Werden, L.K., Holl, K.D., Rosales, J.A.. Sylvester, J.M., Zahawi, R.A. 2019. Effects of dispersal- and niche-based factors on tree recruitment in tropical wet forest restoration. In review. 

Main script is: WerdenEtAl_AnalysisScript.rmd and includes all analysis for the paper. 
All data for analysis are in: WerdenEtAl2019Data.RData and main script reads this file in.
